item.description: Panache has been together since 1989. They have a large play list......Music starts at 800 pm If the weather is good they will be outside at the Oxhead Tavern on the shores of Cedar Lake.... In case of rain it will be in the VIP Lounge It also sometimes ends at 10 PM because of quiet time on the Lake Directions From Worcester and east of Sturbridge Take Rt 20 west past Walmart Plaza ....Turn right just before McDonalds and go to the end of the parking lot....Sturbridge Host will be in front of you and The Oxhead Tavern will be on your left...There is a bar area outside behind The Oxhead where the music is set up outside...Meet at the bar 730...Otherwise look for Gray Grumpy Hat...I will send my cell# to the yes people on Friday...Please update your maybe's to yes or no by Friday 5PM
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at the outside bar 730 Gray Grumpy Hat
item.name: Live Music "Panache" Oxhead Tavern at Sturbridge Host
